comments: From _Vaclav Kotesovec_, Aug 18 2015: (Start)In general, if g.f. = Product_{k>=1} ((1+x^k)/(1-x^k))^m and m>=1, then a(n) ~ exp(Pi*sqrt(m*n)) * m^((m+1)/4) / (2^(3*(m+1)/2) * n^((m+3)/4)).If g.f. = Product_{k>=1} ((1+(-x)^k)/(1-(-x)^k))^m and m>=1, then a(n) ~ (-1)^n * exp(Pi*sqrt(m*n)) * m^((m+1)/4) / (2^(3*(m+1)/2) * n^((m+3)/4)).(End)
formula: a(n) ~ (-1)^n * exp(Pi*sqrt(m*n)) * m^((m+1)/4) / (2^(3*(m+1)/2) * n^((m+3)/4)), set m = 24 for this sequence. - _Vaclav Kotesovec_, Aug 18 2015
mathematica: nmax = 30; CoefficientList[Series[Product[((1 + (-x)^k)/(1 - (-x)^k))^24, {k, 1, nmax}], {x, 0, nmax}], x] (* _Vaclav Kotesovec_, Aug 18 2015 *)
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
